nodes.text: Nuunos were a race of crustaceans native to the wastes of Saleucami. As the world's apex predator, a nuuno was considered extremely dangerous by the Saleucamians.

Massive omnivorous crustaceans, Nuunos were named after the Pantoran word for stone because when they were stationary they resembled a weathered boulder. When in motion, the nuuno was quick and strong, capable of snapping durasteel with its claws. Nearly immune to personal weapons due to its tough carapace, nuunos had long antennas sprouting from their faces.
